original_title: A Day in the Life of a Professional Wrestler
overview: The Traveling Twosome, Louis and Char Magnifico, learn the ropes of professional wrestling from Traditional Championship Wrestling star, Alan Steel. After the training, they step in the ring for a mixed gender wrestling match you must see to believe. The documentary also includes an interview with Lynne Margulies - the late Andy Kaufman's girlfriend. It includes new footage of Kaufman from his wrestling career.
title: A Day in the Life of a Professional Wrestler
